channel.title: Few bits of help please
channel.description:
I need to know how to change bonuses for items like rune scim with 9000k str bonus for example. And how do i change starting items from full dh for example to dragon. I would like something like a guide that says like look for sdgsfgdf.java or whatever.
Thanks

item.title: Few bits of help please
item.dc:creator: @Omerata Omerata
item.description:
@Omerata wrote:

With the bonus’s you go to Items.cfg and look for the item you want.
Then all all the Zero’s are prices then bonuses, i think it goes:

item = ITEMID	//ITEMNAME	//ITEMEXAMINE.	//PRICING	//PRICING	//PRICING	//STABATTACK	//SLASHATTACK	//CRUSHATTACK	//MAGICATTACK	//RANGEATTACK	//STABDEFENCE	//SLASHDEFENCE	//CRUSHDEFENCE	//MAGICDEFENCE	//RANGEDEFENCE	//STRENGTHBOUNUS	//PRAYERBOUNUS

If that makes any sense to you.

Hope it helped.

And with the starting i think it’s in Player.Java but not too sure sorry.

Read full topic
